postArray.title: Code Question
postArray.text: How do would you guys Capitalize the first letter of a word?
postArray.author: Ethan Hardey
postArray.label: Question

replies.replyText: The way that I found to do that is to use charAt(0).toUpperCase() to find the first letter of the word and then append the rest of the word to using .slice(1)

postArray.title: How to write a for loop in Javascript!
postArray.text: For loops in javascript are quite easy, we can write one by typing as follows: for(let i = 0; i < 6; i++){} Inside of those curly brackets you would put the code that would execute inside the loop.
